typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		JobID as integer,
		ProductionID as string,
		FeatureTitle as string,
		ProjectID as string,
		JobStatus as string,
		Territory as string,
		SpotName as string,
		CampaignName as string,
		ClientName as string,
		EndDate as string,
		Description as string,
		UnitsBilled as string,
		BillingTotal as string,
		Currency as string,
		Version as string,
		Asset as string,
		Format as string,
		Destination as string,
		Length as string,
		Language as string,
		Country as string,
		InputDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingSource
source(output(
		ProjectID as integer,
		ClientName as string,
		Currency as string,
		InputDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimProject
StagingSource aggregate(groupBy(ProjectID,
		Currency),
	ClientName = min(ClientName)) ~> Aggregate
toIntProjectID sort(desc(ProjectID, true)) ~> Sort
Sort, DimProject exists(toIntProjectID@ProjectID == DimProject@ProjectID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Exist
Aggregate derive(ProjectID = toInteger(ProjectID)) ~> toIntProjectID
Exist sink(input(
		ProjectID as integer,
		ClientName as string,
		Currency as string,
		InputDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> PopulateDIMProject
